cs213.photoAlbum.control

Interface PhotoSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Control

    public interface PhotoSource
    Interface defines a public API with which the view can interact with the control object. Control is currently the only class that implements this interface.
    Author:
    Karan Kadaru

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • setCurrentUser

        void setCurrentUser(java.lang.String userid)
        Method sets the current user. View would call this when the user logs in, and it defines what user the control object will be operating upon for the rest of the session.
        Parameters:
        userid - The id of the current user.

      • loadUserData

        void loadUserData()
        Method is called after setCurrentUser, and de-serializes the user data and loads it into memory. Should be called directly after setCurrentUser, and before all other interactive methods.

      • addUser

        boolean addUser(java.lang.String userid,
                java.lang.String name)
        Method creates a new user with the given id and name.
        Parameters:
        userid - ID for the new user.
        name - Name for the new user.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser(java.lang.String userid)
        Method removes a user with the given id.
        Parameters:
        userid - ID of the user to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • addAlbum

        boolean addAlbum(java.lang.String album)
        Method adds an album to the current user.
        Parameters:
        album - Name of album to be created.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • removeAlbum

        boolean removeAlbum(java.lang.String album)
        Method removes an album from the current user.
        Parameters:
        album - Name of album to be removed.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • addPhotoToAlbum

        boolean addPhotoToAlbum(java.lang.String album,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String caption)
        Method adds a photo to an album.
        Parameters:
        album - The name of the album to add to.
        name - The name of the photo you're adding.
        caption - The caption for the photo.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • movePhoto

        boolean movePhoto(java.lang.String fromAlbum,
                  java.lang.String toAlbum,
                  java.lang.String name)
        Method moves a photo between albums.
        Parameters:
        fromAlbum - The name of the album to move from.
        toAlbum - The name of the album to move to.
        name - The name of the photo.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • removePhoto

        boolean removePhoto(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a photo from all albums of the current user.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the photo to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • removePhotoFromAlbum

        boolean removePhotoFromAlbum(java.lang.String album,
                             java.lang.String name)
        Removes a photo from a specific album of the current user.
        Parameters:
        album - Name of the album to remove from.
        name - Name of the photo to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • addTagToPhoto

        boolean addTagToPhoto(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String tagType,
                      java.lang.String tagValue)
        Method adds a tag to a given photo.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the photo to receive the tag.
        tagType - Type of the tag to add.
        tagValue - Value of the tag to add.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • addTagToAlbum

        boolean addTagToAlbum(java.lang.String album,
                      java.lang.String tagType,
                      java.lang.String tagValue)
        Method adds a tag to all photos in a specific album.
        Parameters:
        album - Name of the album to add the tag to.
        tagType - Type of the tag to be added.
        tagValue - Value of the tag to be added.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • removeTagFromPhoto

        boolean removeTagFromPhoto(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String tagType)
        Method removes all tags of a given type from a photo.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the photo you want to remove the tags from.
        tagType - The type of tags you want to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • removeTagFromPhoto

        boolean removeTagFromPhoto(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String tagType,
                           java.lang.String tagValue)
        Method removes a specific tag from a photo.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the photo you want to remove the tag from.
        tagType - Type of the tag to be removed.
        tagValue - Value of the tag to be removed.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • removeTagFromAlbum

        boolean removeTagFromAlbum(java.lang.String album,
                           java.lang.String tagType)
        Method removes all tags of a given type from all photos within an album.
        Parameters:
        album - Name of the album to remove the tags from.
        tagType - The type of tag to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

      • removeTagFromAlbum

        boolean removeTagFromAlbum(java.lang.String album,
                           java.lang.String tagType,
                           java.lang.String tagValue)
        Method removes a specific tag from all photos within an album.
        Parameters:
        album - The name of the album to remove the tags from.
        tagType - The type of the tag to remove.
        tagValue - The value of the tag to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the operation was successful.

        Returns:
        The User object.

        Returns:
        An array of photo objects.

      • getPhotosByDate

        Photo[] getPhotosByDate(java.lang.String start,
                        java.lang.String end)
        Method returns a sorted array of photos within a given date range.
        Parameters:
        start - The start date.
        end - The end date.
        Returns:
        An array of photo objects.

      • getPhotosByTag

        Photo[] getPhotosByTag(java.lang.String tagType,
                       java.lang.String tagValue)
        Method returns an array of all photos with a given tag.
        Parameters:
        tagType - The type of the tag to search for.
        tagValue - The value of the tag to search for.
        Returns:
        An array of photos.

      • getTagsForPhoto

        java.lang.String[] getTagsForPhoto(java.lang.String name)
        Method returns an array of tags for a given photo.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the photo to get tags from.
        Returns:
        An array of tags in the format ":"
